pageContext.claim: “And we've done a lot of infrastructure. We just had airports approved. You saw that. A lot of things are happening.”
pageContext.analysis: It's not clear which airports Trump is referring to or what he means by "approved." The House has passed the FAA Reauthorization Act of 2018, which includes funding for airports. But it's not clear that this money would be designated to build new airports, as Trump seems to imply. Furthermore, the bill is pending in the Senate, so it has not received final approval.
